constructors.doc: Creates a new object. This is an embeddable widget used to access the recently used resources list.
constructors.name: new

constructors.doc:
Creates a new with a specified recent manager.

This is useful if you have implemented your own recent manager, or if you have a customized instance of a object.
constructors.name: new_for_manager

doc:
is a widget suitable for selecting recently used files. It is the main building block of a . Most applications will only need to use the latter; you can use as part of a larger window if you have special needs.

Note that does not have any methods of its own. Instead, you should use the functions that work on a .

Recently used files are supported since GTK+ 2.10.
name: RecentChooserWidget
